title: Kidou Senshi Gundam Senki - Lost War Chronicles
description:
The One Year War between the Earth Federation and the Principality of Zeon has begun--and the newest Mobile Suits are tested for battle! 
Captain Matt Healy leads his team into dangerous territory as the leader of a Special Forces Experimental Unit. Ken Bederstadt is a Foreign Legion Lieutenant working in alliance with Zeon. These two heroes are trying to keep everyone alive... for tomorrow!

[b][u]Notes[/u][/b]: 
[*]There are 3 editions of this manga, a 2003 edition and a 2005 "complete" edition with 2 additional chapters - a prequel and a conclusion to the storyline. The version done by HobbyJapan is the 2003 edition.
[*]Alongside [url=https://bit.ly/2FxtLFI]all Matsumoto's Gundam-related titles[/url] the series was later recompiled into [url=https://www.kadokawa.co.jp/product/search/?sort=0&kw=%E6%A9%9F%E5%8B%95%E6%88%A6%E5%A3%AB%E3%82%AC%E3%83%B3%E3%83%80%E3%83%A0%E6%88%A6%E8%A8%98%EF%BC%B2%EF%BC%A5%EF%BC%A2%EF%BC%A5%EF%BC%AC%EF%BC%AC%EF%BC%A9%EF%BC%AF%EF%BC%AE+%EF%BC%AC%EF%BD%8F%EF%BD%93%EF%BD%94%E3%80%80%EF%BC%B7%EF%BD%81%EF%BD%92%E3%80%80%EF%BC%A3%EF%BD%88%EF%BD%92%EF%BD%8F%EF%BD%8E%EF%BD%89%EF%BD%83%EF%BD%8C%EF%BD%85%EF%BD%93]a new [i]Shinsouban[/i] edition[/url], now labeled as [b]Kidou Senshi Gundam Senki REBELLION - Lost War Chronicles[/b]
